sentences.en: a reserved and defensive manner
sentences.cn: 矜持而又戒备的态度

sentences.en: Accessors for immutable properties will always have value semantics and do not need the defensive copying on either side of the call, making them more efficient.
sentences.cn: 不可变属性的存取器将总是具有值引用，因而调用的任何一方都不需要防御性复制，这使得它们效率更高。

sentences.en: Circumstances dictated that they played a defensive rather than attacking game.
sentences.cn: 比赛形势决定了他们要打防守战而不是进攻战。

sentences.en: Don't get defensive, Charlie. I was only joking.
sentences.cn: 别那么大戒心，查利，我只是开个玩笑罢了。

sentences.en: He kept on about me being "defensive".
sentences.cn: 他唠叨个不停，说我“有戒心”。

sentences.en: He smiled, not wanting to put the man on the defensive.
sentences.cn: 他笑了笑，不想让那个人产生抵触情绪。

sentences.en: I'd always played a defensive game, waiting for my opponent to make a mistake.
sentences.cn: 我总是采取防守型的打法，等待对手出错。

sentences.en: Like their children, parents are often defensive about their private lives.
sentences.cn: 就像子女一样，父母也常常很注重保护他们的私生活。

sentences.en: Magnus's army was gradually pushed back into a defensive circle.
sentences.cn: 马格努斯的军队被迫逐步撤回防守圈.

sentences.en: Once a tough defensive team, the Saints now have the most porous defence in the league.
sentences.cn: 圣徒队一度防御能力很强，现在却成了联盟里防守漏洞最多的队伍。

sentences.en: Once he's taken up a defensive attitude, it's difficult to persuade him that there's nothing to be afraid of.
sentences.cn: 一旦他采取防范的态度, 再要使他相信什么也不必担心就困难了.

sentences.en: She despised herself for sounding so defensive.
sentences.cn: 她因自己说的话听起来戒备心过强而自惭形秽。

sentences.en: She heard the blustering, defensive note in his voice and knew that he was ashamed.
sentences.cn: 她听出他话音里的气势汹汹和自我卫护，知道他感到了羞愧。

sentences.en: Talk about boy - friends always puts her on the defensive.
sentences.cn: 一谈到男朋友,她总是戒心十足.

sentences.en: The enemy troops are put on the defensive.
sentences.cn: 敌军被迫采取守势.

sentences.en: The prince drew up his forces in a strong defensive position.
sentences.cn: 亲王将部队布成坚固的防御阵势。

sentences.en: The rockets are a purely defensive measure against nuclear attack.
sentences.cn: 火箭弹纯粹是针对核攻击的防御性措施。

sentences.en: Their questions about the money put her on the defensive.
sentences.cn: 他们问到钱的问题,使她警觉起来.

sentences.en: This is an example of defensive programming.
sentences.cn: 这是一个防御编程的实例。

sentences.en: Troops took up a defensive position around the town.
sentences.cn: 部队在全城采取了守势。

sentences.en: Wailing “You never listen to me” will only make them defensive.
sentences.cn: “你从来不听我说”，这种抱怨只会激起他们自我防御。

sentences.en: Warnings of an enemy attack forced the troops onto the defensive.
sentences.cn: 敌军显示出进攻的迹象,部队不得不进入戒备状态.

words.tran_cn: 卫冕的；防御中的；防守型的
可防御的；可辩护的；可拥护的
防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备
防卫者，守卫者；辩护者；拥护者；卫冕者
防卫，防护；防御措施；防守；vt. 谋划抵御
防卫的可能性；可防御性

phrases.tran_cn: 处于守势：随时准备防御或对入侵和进攻进行反击

trans.tran_cn: 防御(性)的，戒备的，防守的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a way that shows you think someone is criticizing you even if they are not
if you put someone on the defensive in an argument, you attack them so that they are in a weaker position
